snippet: Nicole Vaisey and her boyfriend, Stephen Howells, were charged by federal prosecutors with coercing and exploiting the sisters and some other children.
abstract: Federal prosecutors charge Nicole Vaisey and boyfriend Stephen Howells with coercing and sexually exploiting two Amish girls and some other children in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Nicole Vaisey and her boyfriend, Stephen Howells, were charged by federal prosecutors with coercing and exploiting the sisters and some other children.

headline.main: Two Plead Guilty in Sexual Abuse of 2 Amish Girls in Far Northern New York
headline.print_headline: Two Plead Guilty in Sexual Abuse of Amish Girls
